page.title: 01INTRODUCTION TO THE FOREST
page.content: The area is on the North-Western edge of the{Forest of Dean}following the valley of the{River Wye.}To the{ {Forestry Commission}it is part of the{ {High Meadow.} Much of the area is{forest}but there is some{farmland.}The{forest}is widely used for{recreation.}There are{ {campsites}and the area is popular for activities on{land}and{water.}Many {way-marked paths}lead through the forest and along the river. The most famous is the{Wye Valley Walk.} There are very few buildings in the area.{Wyastone Leys}is a recording studio and at {The Biblins}there is an {Adventure Centre. The main{A40(T)}dual carriageway cuts through the North-Western area of the block.
